paper.title: A New Planet around an M Dwarf: Revealing a Correlation between Exoplanets and Stellar Mass
paper.authors: Johnson, John Asher; Butler, R. Paul; Marcy, Geoffrey W.; Fischer, Debra A.; Vogt, Steven S.; Wright, Jason T.; Peek, Kathryn M. G.
paper.journal: The Astrophysical Journal, Volume 670, Issue 1, pp. 833-840.

paper.title: Astrometry and Radial Velocities of the Planet Host M Dwarf GJ 317: New Trigonometric Distance, Metallicity, and Upper Limit to the Mass of GJ 317b
